name: Zypher (PixelPhobicGames)
description:
Written In C++ and Assembly, Zypher is a Side Scrolling Shooter made for the Gameboy for the gbcomp021 Game Jam.

------------ Story -------------

You are a Pilot in the US Air Force. One Day Aliens Show up and Start Destroying Everything. Armed With The Most High Tech Aircraft, You send those Aliens Back to Where They came One By One.
